summary.span: Controls access to Simple Mail Transport Protocol (SMTP) servers.

span.span: Controls access to Simple Mail Transport Protocol (SMTP) servers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和類別控制 SMTP 主機電腦的存取權。The and classes control access to SMTP host computers. 類別的需求時傳送電子郵件傳遞的 SMTP 主機。The class demands an when sending electronic mail to the SMTP host for delivery. 列舉會指定受此權限的執行個體的存取層級。The enumeration specifies the level of access controlled by an instance of this permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體。The following code example creates an instance of an . remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會說明這些主題說明在一般狀態的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state they describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求將會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立權限物件交集的現有權限授與完整存取權的 SMTP 伺服器的物件。The following code example creates a permission object that is the intersection of an existing permission with an object that grants full access to SMTP servers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的使用權限指定完全包含在指定的權限的狀態，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a state that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示兩個權限的子集關係。The following code example displays the subset relationship between two permissions. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回代表的權限的所有狀態，表示由目前使用權限和指定的權限。The method returns a permission that represents all the states represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何通過其中之一權限的需求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個權限物件的聯集的權限物件。The following example creates a permission object that is the union of two permission objects.
